title: 'rustc' panicked at 'do not use `optimized_mir` for constants: Const',

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust https://gist.github.com/rust-play/00c628037372767e81f239fd87f7ed55 ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.51.0-nightly (04caa632d 2021-01-30) binary: rustc commit-hash: 04caa632dd10c2bf64b69524c7f9c4c30a436877 commit-date: 2021-01-30 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.51.0-nightly LLVM version: 11.0.1 ``` `cargo --version --verbose`: ``` cargo 1.51.0-nightly (c3abcfe8a 2021-01-25) release: 1.51.0 commit-hash: c3abcfe8a75901c7c701557a728941e8fb19399e commit-date: 2021-01-25 ``` ### Error output ``` Compiling secret_integers_usage v0.1.0 (/home/basavesh/research/rustStuff/splitspectre/secret_integers_usage) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'do not use `optimized_mir` for constants: Const', compiler/rustc_mir/src/transform/mod.rs:579:24 query stack during panic: #0 [optimized_mir] optimizing MIR for `simple::get_secret_key::{constant#0}` end of query stack error: could not compile `secret_integers_usage` ```
Backtrace

``` 0: 0x7fdf4ef05de7 - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::h8bc78f7bc1f75bdb at /rustc/04caa632dd10c2bf64b69524c7f9c4c30a436877/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:90:5 1: 0x7fdf4ef05de7 - ::fmt::h04bea14549780a0f at /rustc/04caa632dd10c2bf64b69524c7f9c4c30a436877/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:46:22 4: 0x7fdf4ef76ebc - core::fmt::write::h3868db8542c90941 at /rustc/04caa632dd10c2bf64b69524c7f9c4c30a436877/library/core/src/fmt/mod.rs:1096:17 5: 0x7fdf4eef8612 -
